post.body: Well earned, Peter! Congratulations! Time to switch your name to Cyberdiver having conquered more now than just sky! Best - Hal
Welcome back, David! Nice to see your tweet.
Thanks, Peggy, and congratulations on keeping your business strong. You are indeed an entrepreneur worth reckoning with.
I like your blog & artwork; But never heard back if temperature is a problem w/your work: can it melt? Did U C Helen Harris art?
@nd visit, found it but 2nd time frame froze until I clicked away and returned, then voted - Always teach listen 80% talk 20%!
Both require extensive listening before taking a step forward into someone else's space!
Welcome Back! Good to hear you're back to the keyboard.
Visited your blog; nice work; couldn't find the "super quick poll," but enjoyed the rest. Refreshing to know others who agree!
They all have HomeDepot's floors?
Thx & MC2U2! No, THIS special blog post was a few days in the making and saved for launch minutes ago @ www.halalpiar.com xoxo!
Aaaah, including newspapers?
... & 2U! U brought THE only good cheer 2 politics this year! Stay in the fray after New Year's Day! It's about being genuine!
. . . AND TO ALL A GOOD NIGHT. . .WITH NO CURSOR STIRRING, NOT EVEN YOUR MOUSE. . . www.halalpiar.com for the rest of the story
Y'all sounding like Lower Slower instead of big city W. I want to spend time w/family & for U2 lose your cold! Merry Christmas!
Interesting to cross-check your 20 questions with my Dec 6 15-point Entrepreneur Test post (Dec. archives www.halalpiar.com)
I believe the answer depends on what I most want to do with my available time and at what price.
Greetings, Salesblogcast! Can't get U showing on my Direct Message dropdown(?) Did you catch ref to U/your blog this wk @ www.halalpiar.com?
VISIT my new re-invent-yourself-going-into-the year-end-home-stretch ad for TheWriterWorks.com @ MerchantCircle.com Writing/Consltg/ProjMgmt
Can we talk about Twitter critics who claim biz focus many of us have is killing social impact abilities & purposes? I LOVE the biz Xchnge!
W/Special Thanks to DOYLE SLAYTON & www.salesblogcast.com see my post at www.halalpiar.com on SELLING WITH BEDSIDE MANNERS

Turn on the lights! Scale the heights! The sky is falling! What is this, Chicken Little? BIZ OWNERS & MGRS CAN'T MISS THIS www.halalpiar.com
HOWCUM NOW it's up to the driver to decide if she or he is too tired to signal a turn or 1+1/2 blink lane change? http://blog.igburton.com
Wondering Y no reply 2 "I like yr blog & artwork; But never heard back if temperature's a problem w/your work: can it melt?" No ? if I knew
DOGS, MUSIC AND BJ's ... no kinky stuff, just some biz observations www.halalpiar.com & Happy Birthday to my musician son at www.alpiar.com
EVERY purchase decision is an emotionally-based or triggered decision to buy benefits. Features are just to justify. www.halalpiar.com
Paying a not-yet-opened retailer for the privilege of shopping there? Whaat? Try me tonight: www.halalpiar.com

If you care about where ur business life is headed, you need 2 check into or RSS www.halalpiar.com everyday (or night) for brain stimulation
